title: COVID-19 Vaccine Accessibility in the Autism Community
cleaned_text:
Join Autism Speaks, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the Autism Society of America and the Autism Science Foundation for a webinar about tools to make the COVID-19 vaccine more accessible for people with autism. Learn why it is so important to get vaccinated and how to make the experience more comfortable for yourself or your family member with autism.
• Share research about the health impacts of COVID-19 infection and importance of vaccination
• Discuss tools to make the vaccine experience more accessible to the autism community
• Answer questions from participants around the COVID-19 vaccine and accessibility.

opengraph.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Accessibility in the Autism Community | Autism Speaks
